rows.label: qst201411_msg0001
rows.name:
I heard from Nia about your little
contest. Are you still at it?

rows.label: qst201411_msg0002
rows.name:
Yeah, it's all good! Maybe you can
judge our Girl Power for us, Meleph!

rows.label: qst201411_msg0003
rows.name:
Well, I only came out here to get some
water... But, of course, why not?

rows.label: qst201411_msg0004
rows.name:
Meleph... Do you ever desire a bit of
romance?

rows.label: qst201411_msg0005
rows.name: I am a soldier of the Superbian Empire.

rows.label: qst201411_msg0006
rows.name:
Romance would divert valuable time
away from perfecting my military arts.

rows.label: qst201411_msg0007
rows.name: Don't you get sick of all that fighting?

rows.label: qst201411_msg0008
rows.name: No, as it happens.

rows.label: qst201411_msg0009
rows.name:
Nothing beats cultivating one's
character together with one's friends.

rows.label: qst201411_msg0010
rows.name:
It's an enjoyable and worthwhile
activity. This is how I've always looked
at it.

rows.label: qst201411_msg0011
rows.name:
Meleph, you take life too seriously.
Don't you ever just want to take a
break?

rows.label: qst201411_msg0012
rows.name:
No, not all. To be honest, I think you,
and all our Blades here, are lacking
dedication.

rows.label: qst201411_msg0013
rows.name:
If you were Superbian Army Blades,
you'd be living a much more focused
life, I can tell you.

rows.label: qst201411_msg0014
rows.name:
Superbian Blades would never stay up
half the night in frivolous chatter.
They'd rest up for the next day!

rows.label: qst201411_msg0015
rows.name:
A first-rate fighter never lets up on her
training.

rows.label: qst201411_msg0016
rows.name:
This applies all the more while you're
young. You need to be strict with your
routine and rid yourself of bad habits!

rows.label: qst201411_msg0017
rows.name: Erm...Meleph...?

rows.label: qst201411_msg0018
rows.name:
You got your point across pretty clearly
there, Meleph. Thanks so much...

rows.label: qst201411_msg0019
rows.name: No! I haven't finished yet...

rows.label: qst201411_msg0020
rows.name:
You two need to reaffirm your
commitment to the warrior life.

rows.label: qst201411_msg0021
rows.name:
You should sit there quietly and listen!
And don't even think about running off!

rows.label: qst201411_msg0022
rows.name: What...?!
